mdRecord.dcterms:title: Ancient Roman retractor (replica)
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Replica of an ancient Roman retractor from the first century A.D. Most likely a replica of instrument number 68 cataloged in the following source: Bliquez, L.J. (1994) Roman surgical instruments and other minor objects in the National Archaeological Museum of Naples. Manz, von Zabern. Donated to the University of Virginia by members of the 8th Evacuation Hospital Unit of the United States Army.
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Medicine, Greek and Roman
Medical instruments and apparatus
